title: The Snow - part 3
description: ***PART 3 IN THE SEQUEL TO THE RAIN***Tanner is alone. The tears and blood have mixed together into concrete, and Nuke town wants to bring her down underneath the quiet white. But something stirs next to her. Furry brown bright eyes and a will to live.But where is there left to go? What hope might be found alone in such a barren place? Find out in part 3 of The Snow.
author: Joseph A. Turkot
